bridge-type.label: Milight Bridge
bridge-type.description: This bridge represents a Milight device.

parameter.name: ADDR
parameter.label: IP or Host Name
parameter.description: Will be resolved by discovery if auto configured

parameter.name: PORT
parameter.label: Bridge port
parameter.description: This differs for different bridge devices. The newest ones use 8899. Older ones use 50000.

parameter.name: ID
parameter.label: Bridge ID
parameter.description: The mac address in upper case letters without delimiter for Version 3+ bridges. Leave empty for Version 1/2 devices. This is used to check if the given IP corresponds to the right device. The bridge is set offline if the device does not respond with the correct Bride ID and a re-detection is started. Useful for DHCP environments where IPs may change over time, after power outage etc.

parameter.name: REFRESH
parameter.label: Refresh interval
parameter.description: Interval in minutes to check for device presence. The Bridge ID is used to check if the IP is still the right one.

channel-type.label: Brightness
channel-type.description: The brightness can be set in 16 steps

channel-type.label: Color temperature
channel-type.description: The "white" leds allow to change between a cold and a warm color temperature

channel-type.label: Animation speed
channel-type.description: The speed of some animations can be changed

channel-type.label: Animation mode
channel-type.description: Animation mode of your LED. The color leds supports more animations than the white ones
